passage_text: Average salaries and wages in Dubai and UAE. Table of average wages and salary ranges for jobs in Dubai. Similar pay scales and wages paid in Abu Dhabi companies and jobs (or higher), similar or lower in other emirates. All salary figures are monthly in UAE dirhams (AED) (3.67 dhs = US$1).
The salary for CCIE certified engineers in Dubai ranges from AED 35,759 to AED 306,386. The job opportunities are very wide here for CCIE engineers.
